translations.Invalid data to sign file: Datos pro firmare is archìvios non bàlidos
translations.Digital signed by LibreSign. Validate in: Posta sa firma digitale dae LibreSign. Cunvàlida in %s
translations.Inform URL or base64 or fileID to sign: URL de relata, base64 o fileID de firmare
translations.Already asked to sign this document: Giai fata sa dimanda pro firmare custu documentu
translations.Must be a fileID of a PDF: Depet èssere unu fileID de unu PDF
translations.You are not allowed to request signing: Non tenes su permissu pro rechèdere sa firma
translations.You do not have permission for this acti: Non tenes su permissu pro fàghere de aici.
translations.No signature was requested to %s: Non s'est fata dimanda pro peruna firma %s
translations.Signer not associated to this file: Perunu utente assotziadu pro firmare custu archìviu
translations.UUID not found: No se ha hallado el UUID
translations.You must have an email. You can define t: Depes tènnere un'indiritzu de posta eletrònica. Ddu podes ispetzificare in su profilu tuo?
translations.Password to sign is mandatory: Pro firmare est pretzisu a tènnere sa crae
S'est assotziadu un'archìviu de custa genia.
S'utente b'est giai. Intra, pro praghere.
Non ses in intro. Intra, pro praghere.
translations.LibreSign: Changes into a file for you t: LIbreSign: Càmbios in intro de un archìviu chi depes firmare
translations.Changes have been made in a file that yo: B'at àpidu càmbios in un'archìviu chi deves firmare. Intra a su ligàmene in fatu:
translations.LibreSign: There is a file for you to si: LibreSign: b'at un'archìviu che deves firmare
translations.There is a document for you to sign. Acc: B'at unu docuementu de firmare. Intra a su ligàmene in fatu:
Sa dimanda de firma est istada cantzellada.
translations.Invalid URL file: URL de s'archìviu no est bàlidu
Sa URL diat dèpere èssere unu PDF.
translations.Name is mandatory: Est pretzisu a pònnere su nùmene
translations.Inform or UUID or a File object: Informa o UUID o unu File object
translations.User list needs to be an array: S'elencu de utentes devet èssere unu vetore
translations.Remove duplicated users, email address n: Boga ·nche is utentes dòpios, is indiritzos de posta eletrònica devet èssere ùnicos
translations.✍️ Libre digital signature app for Nextc: ✍️ Aplicatzione lìbera pro firmas digitales pro Nextcloud
translations.**This is a libre digital PDF signature:
**Custa est un'aplicatzione lìbera pro firmas PDF digitales pro Nextcloud**

* ✍️ Firma is documentos PDF impreende una firma digitale
* ⚠️ Pro sa cunfiguratzione de s'aplicatzione bi cheret s'atzessu a su terminale e fintzas de ti brutare is manos cun s'installatzione de su programma in agiunta. Càstia is [istrutziones de cunfiguratzione](https://github.com/LibreSign/libresign/blob/main/README.md#setup) pro is detàllios.
* **Rechisitos :**
    * Server CFSSL
    * Java
    * JSignPDF
translations.LibreSign, digital signature app for Nex: LibreSign, aplicatzione pro sa firma digitale pro Nextcloud.
translations.This action requires you to confirm your: Pro fàghere custu tocat chi cunfirmes sa crae tua
translations.Create your password for signing PDF: Crea sa crae tua pro firmare su PDF
translations.Create password to sign document: Crea una crae pro firmare su documentu
translations.Are you sure you want to exclude user {e: Ses seguru chi nche cheres lassare in foras s'utente {email} dae sa rechesta?
translations.This iframe is not supported in your bro: Custu iframe no est suportadu dae su navigadore tuo.
translations.Enter your password to sign this documen: Pone sa crae pro firmare su documentu
translations.You need to create a password to sign th: Depes creare una crae pro firmare custu documentu. Incarca "Crea crae pro firmare su documentu" e crea una crae.
translations.To generate new signatures, you must fir: Pro generare firmas noas, pro prima cosa depes generare su tzertificadu sorgente.
translations.For security reasons, you must create a: Pro una chistione de seguresa, depes creare una crae pro firmare is documentos. Pone sa crae tua noa in su campu in suta.
translations.New password to sign documents has been: Crae noa pro firmare documentos creada
translations.Error creating new password, please cont: Errore creande sa crae noa, pro praghere, cuntata a s'amministratzione
translations.Root certificate has not been configured: Tzertificadu sorgente non ancora cunfiguradu dae s'amministratzione!
translations.You need to create an account with the s: Depes creare unu contu cun su pròpiu indiritzu de posta eletrònica in ue as retzidu s'invitu
translations.The email entered is not the same as the: S'indiritzu de posta eletrònica no est su pròpiu de cuddu de s'invitu
Sa crae depet giùghere a su mancu 3 caràteres.
translations.Set a password to sign the document: Imposta una crae pro firmare su documentu
translations.Sorry but the page you are looking for d: Perdona, ma sa pàgina chi ses chirchende non b'est prus, nche l'ant bogada, tramudada o immoe no est a disponimentu.
translations.Congratulations you have digitally signe: Augùrios, as postu sa firma digitale a unu documentu impreende LibreSign
translations.Subscription generated and available at: Sutaiscritzione generada e a disponimentu in {path}!
translations.There was an error completing your reque: B'at àpidu un'errore cumpletende sa rechesta
Sèbera s'archìviu pro rechèdere is firmas.
translations.Enter the emails that will receive the r: Pone is indiritzos de posta eletrònica pro retzire sa rechesta
translations.Signatures for this document have alread: Firmas pro custos documentos giai rechertas
translations.Enter new password and then repeat it: Pone sa crae noa e a pustis torra·dda a pònnere
translations.To validate signature of the documents: Para convalidar la firma de is documentos
translations.You need to create an account to sign th: Depes creare unu contu pro firmare custu documentu.
